modName: PKPresets 2- Ladies of Legend for Racemenu
summary: Some new Racemenu presets, with (suggested) roleplay backgrounds and EVEN MORE SASS
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][size=5][font=Arial]PKPresets- Ladies of Legend for Skyrim.[/font]
[/size][/b][/u][size=3]Some new presets with backstories and MORE PERSONALITY. Modular files so you don't clog your presets folder![/size]
[font=Courier New][color=#00ff00][size=6][i]If you like this and appreciate my work, go on, add an image![/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman]Backstories:[/font]
[font=Times New Roman][size=4][u]Noor:
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71959-3-1450133899.jpg[/img]
[/u][/size][/font][color=#ff0000][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Adopted by Nazir after being orphaned as the result of a botched contract, Noor grew up knowing very little about her parents, other than the fact that they both met their ends by brotherhood daggers. Despite being raised as a merciless assassin and trained as a killing machine, Noor refuses to carry out contracts involving the elimination of married targets, as part of a set of personal tennets that she (mostly) adheres to.[/size][/font]
[/color][u][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Chell:
[/size][/font][/u][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71959-1-1450212266.jpg[/img]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#ff7700][size=4]Born to Cave Bjornson and his wife Caroline, Chell possesses the unique ability to teleport, and can disappear at will. Raised as a keen alchemist, her parents hoped that she would take over their shop, Apertura Enchanters, however Chell's parents tragically died after Cave's failed attempts at storing his wife's conscience inside a soul gem led to both being eternally soul-trapped.
*Yes, she is based of Chell from Portal!*
[/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4][u]Asureth:
[/u][/size][/font][u][b][size=5][font=Arial][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71959-0-1450212267.jpg[/img]
[/font][/size][/b][/u][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#8e7cc3]A Dunmer born with the unique ability to breathe underwater, Asureth is a relatively new member of  the thieve's guild, although she is not at all new to the art of thieving. Raised on the streets of Balmora before swimming all the way to Skyrim, Asureth is an expert pickpocket and a deceptive beauty...
[/color][u]Moris:
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71959-0-1450120795.jpg[/img]
[/u][color=#a64d79]A ruthless but elegant Forsworn shaman, Moris is a master conjurer and an expert at swordplay. Moris definitely takes after her mother, who was the village medic until her death. Having never left her village, Moris knows little of the outside world and is always suspicious of visitors. She plans to leave now that dragons are rumored to have reappeared in Tamriel.
[/color][u]Niola:
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71959-1-1450300025.jpg[/img]
[/u][color=#93c47d]Raised by some of the most devout worshippers of Mehrunes Dagon the Summerset Isles have ever seen, Niola was quite literally born a rebel. A skilled illusionist and prolific troublemaker, Niola is one of the College of Winterhold's most mischievous students on record. Never seen wearing any colour other than black, Niola is a keeper of many dark secrets...
[/color][u]Prisma:
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71959-2-1450476184.jpg[/img]
[/u][color=#6d9eeb]Born and raised in Valenwood, Prisma was always disgusted by her people's cannibalistic tendencies. As soon as she reached the age of sixteen, she fled to Skyrim and took up a new life doing bounty work in Hjaalmarch. With a sophisticated attitude and kindly demeanor, Prisma is worlds apart from her Wood Elf kin. Now she has settled in, she plans on building her own home in Morthal.[/color]
[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ff00]The optional file, Fab Argonian, looks best with Feminine Argonians: Chameleon Edition. [/color][color=#ff00ff]The 'My' images are the same as the presets, just with hair from the KS Hairdos Pack.[/color][/font]

[/size]You will need:
RaceMenu by Expired
SKSE by silverlock
Ethereal Elven Overhaul by Nuska
Apachii Sky Hair- Main and Female by Apachii
True Eyes by JimtownIrish
The Eyes of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
Neithteam warpaints
Mods I used:
SG female textures renewal
CBBE Curvy with NeverNude
ENB- Wilds ENB
Painterly Warpaints

Don't forget to download, endorse and submit an image, I'd love to see these ladies' insane adventures.
[img]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130711114420/the-modest-mouse/images/0/07/Help_wanted_sign_swing_hg_clr.gif[/img]
[font=Courier New][color=#00ff00][size=4]My creation kit keeps crashing so I need an extra hand. Would anyone like to help me turn these characters into followers? I will credit you and upload it under your name. Lots of people have requested it and I thought it would be a cool thing to try. [/size][/color][/font][font=Courier New][size=4][color=#ff0000]Message me if you are interested.[/color]
[/size][/font]
[size=6]Remember to give me feedback!!!! If you like this mod endorse it and tell me what you like in the comments. If you have a suggestion, by Azura, get typing!!![/size]

[size=4]Thank you so much, be kind to eachother and most importantly, happy modding!
[/size][b][size=4]-Phoebe.K

[/size][/b]FAQ:
Q: This mod sucks I hate you.
A: That's not a question. Every mod is flawed in some way, like Thor's cape in this GIF image.
[img]http://media1.giphy.com/media/7peuZD6EX1y3m/200.gif[/img]
Q: Where the hell do I put it help meeeeeeeeee?????!!!!!!!
A: Your main directory is in (On windows 8): Windows (C:)>Program Files [u](x86)[/u]>Steam>SteamApps>common>Skyrim
And here's some cat GIFs because they are an integral part of a good description.
[img]http://media2.giphy.com/media/kIkwipWRoqeUE/giphy.gif[/img]
[img]http://www.catgifs.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/046_boxing_cat_gifs.gif[/img]
author: Phoebe
